channel.title: Pimpscape safe zones help me please!
channel.description:
Well everytime someone on my server is in a safe zone someone use's there mage and kills them in a safe zone i mean how can i stop them doing that!?
I want to make it so that thay cant kill people in a safe zone AT ALL
Please someone help me i will be very aprishiated :)
Thx
Shebitch

item.title: Pimpscape safe zones help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

OK, the reason people get attacked in your safe zones is because if you stand at the very back of a save zone, it’s technically not a part of the safe zone. I don’t know why. I was wondering the same thing a while back, but I realised that when I stood closer to the midsection of the safe zone, I wasn’t taking damage when people just outside were Ice Barraging.

Read full topic
item.source: Pimpscape safe zones help me please!
